Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/16th
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, 16th, 50th Avenue, Cermak and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, 16th, 50th Avenue, Cermak and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/16th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cicero/16th
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, 50th Avenue, and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cicero/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, 50th Avenue, and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cicero/16th.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at  Pulaski due to door problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to door problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
